extendedInfo.description: *** News update: www.brighthub.com: Nr2 of best soccer apps for Android! ***---SUMMARY---:-Predicts future match-results based on data.-Provides team-to-team overviews from largest historic database available! (181.000 match-data from 49 competitions)  -No live internet connection required. -Even teams from the past are visible.-No live scores updates. There are enough apps in the appstore to do this. -Live Standings/Ranking for each competition.The Football Database is a must-have app for football (soccer) lovers!  It's built to predict future match-results based on historic data; very usefull for betting pools and sports lotteries. It also gives you an overview of all team-to-team matches of the near past. With historic data from 49 competitions, 2.130 clubs and over 179.000 matches, you will be able to amaze your friends in the stadium, the pub or at home.The standard version gives you access to ALL national competitions and ALL matches we have data from in these competitions. For some competitions we even have matches from before 1920! If you like the app, you can upgrade for a small fee. This way you can get access to international club tournaments and international country tournaments like the Champions League or the World Cup.Have fun!Complete list in 3 categories:National competitions: ------Australia - reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Have lowered my score. Paid to upgrade to Pro version on my phone. Have logged on tablet and wants me to pay a second time. Never seen an app charge per device.  And if only the English Leagues could be expanded to include Championship, League 1, 2 and the Conference... After all, it\'s what us Brits bet on most...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice Apps
reviews.comment: A very useful apps...If only the free version could access the national team & continental club championship,I would have given 5 stars...Anyway,keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Hizkia Respatiadi

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The score predictor should be more than 15 games then I\'d give it a 5 star
reviews.author: curtis mccarthy

reviews.title: The football data base

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Always being improved that makes the app great

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Best app ever! Love saturdays n sundays! That\'s when this baby comes good in hand! One bad thing, there is no lower leagues... Like \"the championship\" if this app gets the crappier leagues, then this app is in her prime!
reviews.author: A Google User
